name: Ancient power Unbound
text: You can discard 1 card from your hand and if you do you can add 1 Anciant Spell/Trap from your deck. All Omni Monsters on your side of the field gain 500 ATK every Standby Phase ignoring there immunity. You can target up to 3 Omni Monsers or Ancient Spells/Traps. You can only use each effect of "Ancient Power Unbound" once per turn.
